content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the living room watching the uk florida football game,when the dark object in my right palm started getting hot, and tingle, and when it does this, i know what's going to happen, i'm going to see them yet again.  this makes 7 times since august 2011 ,when was the first time i saw this dark triangular craft. the starting last may i've seen this craft 6 times, and august of last year is when i know for a fact i'm missing time, a lot of time, nearly 4 hours, and this is when i noticed i had something in the palm of my right hand. each and every time i have seen this craft since then, this thing in the palm of my hand heats up, and tingles. the craft is what i can tell the exact one i've seen over the years. i've tried to take pictures and videos, but my cameras will not work, but when they are gone, they work fine.  i don't know what to do, or who to turn to. the very first time i reported this was last year in may, but i reported it to the nation ufo reporting center ,and this is the second time i've reported it. i hope you can help me,cause i am scared, i do t know who to turn to. please help me if you can.
content.summary: Object in right hand heated up,and tingled,then a flash of light,tv went off ,i went out and was hit with light. am missing close to an hour .

content.detailedDescription: Bright large blue/white light like a meteor traveling very fast low in the sky west to east diappeared
content.summary: Looked like a meteor unlike none i've ever seen

content.detailedDescription: (937) 670-6221 i was with a friend and then out of the corner of my eye i saw it
content.summary: It was following me in my car

content.detailedDescription:
From the second floor i was learning how to use the digital zoom on the compact camera.  this was my first time to use digital zoom in scn mode since i always use optical zoom on the panasonic camera.  after reviewing the image and enlarging it in the viewscreen on the camera there is an object in the image that i did not notice when i photographed the tree tops.  at first i thought the object could be a balloon or a football.  the size of the object must be at least 100 cm wide based on the distance from the size of the windows of the houses in the background.  i felt this could be related to the unexplained light reported in mufon northern california.

the object is not in the following images after the image of the ellipse. i photographed more than one exposure of the tree tops when testing the digital zoom focusing.

the ellipsoid reminded me the 2012 november 11th knbr news media report of the ufo in federal heights, looking south toward denver, colorado that repeatedly appears at noon in daylight.
content.summary: Making a digital photo of the trees using digital zoom.  after reviewing the images noticed an ellipse object on the tree branch.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was dark so the surface was unable to be seen but there were multiple lights in a straight line spaced apart and they were blinking back and forth in several different colors, red blue, green, and white but very bright yet no glow around them. at the first sight, one was gliding across the sky at a very high altitude then drop closer to the earth while moving from west to east and from my position, it was located south west. then another appeared to the north east and it was traveling east to west. then we noticed the first had suddenly just started to move back to the west from the east in the south from my position and the one to the north was moving along a the same speed and direction. the northern ufo was closer to us. maybe a mike or two away. the one to the south was quite far but both  had the same lighting differences. when the second appeared, am airplane was passing overhead and clearly the light patern was nothing like what we were witnessing. they glided in silence making no sound. i was nervous but excited at the same time and also my phone was acting wired cause i called my sister whom had just left. she walked outside to go to work after looking up she saw it. the other night the same one was floating in the sky. that's how this all started. we lost sight because they just disappeared.
content.summary: Saw multiple colored lights blinking brightly as it moved from west to east then suddenly mived west again as another appeared across in the north moving east to west

content.detailedDescription:
Preface: i've seen these triangle-shaped vehicles many times now and viewed thru 10x50 power binoculars; so many in fact i don't bother reporting them anymore. the only reason i'm reason i am in this instance is the incredible acceleration i witnessed tonight was a first.  

generally, they just mozy by at more-or-less the same apparent size as commercial aircraft, but generally lower in altitude (20k-30k feet i would guess), somewhat slower (maybe 15%-20%) and absolutely no jet-engine sound associated with them regardless of relative distance. 

they all look the same: three solid white lights at each of the three corners and a solid red strobe light at the center of the fuselage. with binoculars and enough backlight sometimes you can also make out the outlines of the vehicle ie., solid lines connecting all the vertices. the strobe illuminates the hull just enough to differentiate the shape as well.  

tonight i noticed what looked like a dull-brown orb moving in the western sky - moving north-to-south - about 15 degrees off the horizon. i grabbed my binocs and took a look and sure enough it was a 3-pointed triangle. i watched it drift by for about 4-5 minutes with nothing too exciting happening, per usual - but as it got almost directly south of me (still watching in the binoculars), it literally shot almost straight up into the sky! it's appearance went from three distinguishable white lights, to a point of light, getting smaller-and-smaller as it ascended, to just gone, in under 5 seconds. 

it was less than 15 degrees off the horizon, having traveled considerably further away, and shot up in at least a 45 deg arc to maybe 25-30 degrees, and then simply vanished. it was easily the fastest thing i've ever seen in the sky, save for a shooting star.

there was no change in light intensity, or any flash or sound; just moving at a constant speed/direction then abruptly swooping up and gone in just a few seconds; 5 seconds is being generous in all reality - probably more like 3 seconds. 

unbelievable to see. it was obvious that it went out of the atmosphere and not below the horizon. it simply got smaller and smaller until it was no longer visible. it wasn't in the "blink-of-an-eye" fast, but nearly that fast. must be some crazy ride flying those things.
content.summary: Triangle ufo - incredible acceleration!!!

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i drove up ghost road in port perry, a local hot spot for ghost activity after a motorcyclist had an accident there. have been a few times before but never saw anything out of the ordinary. just to give you an idea for the area, it's on an island most of it is either native reserve or farm land and forest. the ghost road is in between a few farms. some trees line this street. usually we just park the car at one end of the road, walk to the end of it, then walk back. we were half way down walking the opposite direction of the car. my boyfriend (conveniently) was walking backwards talking to me. there is small forest off in the distance, i would say a km or 2 away. that's when i saw something shoot up out of the forest about 100 feet above the tree line. it was an ultraviolet colour and was in the shape of a diamond. as soon as i told my boyfriend to turn around, the best way i can describe it is it flattened or pancaked itself and disappeared. it made no sound and my boyfriend did not catch a glimpse of it. this all happened in a matter of seconds. when i first saw it shoot up out of the forest i thought it was a firework, but within a second of seeing it, my mind changed. when i saw it i almost fell to my knees. i really don't know what it was, my mind leans to ufo because i have been a strong believer in ufos and aliens for a long time. i thought about it logically for a long time. the things running through my mind were reasons why it wasn't a firework. 
1. solid diamond shaped bright ultraviolet
2. no sound
3. shot up out of a forest
4. changed shape flattening itself
5. city firework bi-law "prohibited to sell any consumer fireworks to any person at any time except on the statutory holidays known as victoria day and canada day and the seven (7) days immediately preceding those days"
content.summary: Ultraviolet diamond shape shot up out of forest, flatened itself and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Pulled truck to the front yard. went to check the mail.  saw that the sunset was pretty and took the photo.  i didn't see anything with my naked eyes.  just saw it when i looked at the picture.  i had a sighting in 2008 feb. 29th. i reported here also. but, that sighting was more in depth. the picture should have the correct time on it.  i guess the round about time.
content.summary: Orb. just saw in picture.

content.detailedDescription: Was in the back yard with my kids and seen a rainbow in the clouds and was trying to take a picture of that. later on i noticed that their was a circular object in both pictures. would just like to know what it is.
content.summary: Just seen in picture after taking shot of a rainbow in the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
most abduction times,i remember (but not the actual event, always after or seemed like dream) i was at home. a couple of times, time missing, i was traveling alone or with my two young boys.The one that stands out, we were going from ma. to nh. it was winter.It was the mid 90's. i remember looking up (before or after whatever happened) then, i was looking up, then at the road and area,and the time, and thinking, we didn't get lost. where are we? seems like we're lost/ missing time...One hour or less than two. it's so dark. i never remember contact. was just confused and dazed.
   i have viewed on other occasions, seen and followed ufo at night, town lights on as was dark,over water,or close to, noticed different colored bright lights blinking, "wobbling" as it moved, one ufo, moving slowly but in a zig-zag, not too high in the sky. aprrx position 2 o'clock to 12 to ii, upwardly mobile [over small town. well lit area. noticed by movement or a "feeling". note: located near whoi... woods hole oceanographic institute. [also, we have otis ***air force base (camp edwards) nearby and a ***nuclear power plant, btw.] i followed it (ufo), i was driving at time, until we hit water at end of the road. marina(?) area. then it disappeared. my son was with me. he was young.
   my father, on a police shift in the 60's or early 70's, saw one over beach, central cape cod,ma. he called it in. not believed. unsure if anyone else reported. he is straight up non-drinker, no drugs, no drinking, black and white kind of guy. if he said he saw one, and i've asked a few times, he saw a ufo. end of story.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Dark, clear, night sky over land(?) then water. moved oddly and shape/lights appeared to wobble, hover then going left(nw-w) up/down path zig-zag. stayed in same general area moved slowly,hovered then lost it?? gone.

content.detailedDescription:
Greetings folks! my son, his friend rian, and me were just outside starwatching and had the awesome opportunity to observe five incredible orbs all within several minutes. the first one, directly overhead, stopped and lit up, almost like a surge. then it took off toward the east. we then saw a high altitude jet following it. the jet was running a red strobe. not the conventional running lights. it looked military. once that was over, the second orb came dancing across the sky, also eastbound. this one zigzagged and danced around a bit. the third and fourth showed up at the same time and did their bit. the last, the fifth, was really cool! this one blinked a lot, would stop and go again, disappeared once only to reappear seconds later in a different location.
it was a perfect show! thanks et's!
content.summary: Observed five orbs/starlike objects in night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the sea place condominiums in saint augustine beach and first saw two dark helicopters flying south. about 15 min later i nonchalantly looked up at the sky and saw an object flying to the north. i first thought it was a plane but realized it wasn't shaped like any plane i had ever seen. i was cylindrical in shape and had a pair of what looked like stubby wings at each end. i watched it fly north almost directly over my head, occasionally going into a cloud. it flew into a deep cloud and i then lost sight of it.
content.summary: Suspected ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was out exploring off road and took a break on the honeymoon trail. 1/4 mile away to the east is a 500 foot ridge. i was looking up the ridge to see if any mountain goats were on it. suddenly appearing in the sky above the ridge was a chevron shaped craft coming from behind me. it actually just appeared in the sky and moving lightning fast then going behind the ridge. because it appeared in the middle of my view indicates to me it slowed down enough for my vision to see it. it was the classic flying v with 3 belly lights on each leg. point,  pointing forward. it was a considerable distance away and yet still looked gigantic compared to jet airliners i've seen at that distance.
content.summary: Phoenix lights craft seen in day light.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work sat at my desk. it was the first real warm spring day we'd had of 2017 and also a friday morning so a combination of nice warm weather and the anticipation of the weekend and the end of winter had me and everyone else at work that day in good spirits. even though it was still quite a blustery/breezy day with patchy cloud, the sun was out and i could feel it's warmth through the window directly in front of me - something i'd not felt since mid october 2016. i am quite an aviation geek so the reasonably clear skies were giving me the perfect opportunity to spot air traffic. i looked to up to my right (south,south west) and noticed 2 objects stationary and hovering - quite a distance and altitude from where i was. after a short observation, i realized they weren't helicopters as they had no appenditures or rotors or visible form of propulsion - and were a solid disc/ord/ball shape. i then thought they may be weather balloons but maintained a constant fixed position and were uneffected by the wind/breeze that was moving the clouds around them. they drifted slightly further apart then closer together but maintained the same high altitude and distance from me. i alerted my colleague sat to at the desk to my left - i picked up my iphone 7 and started taking their pictures (i have quite a few pictured of them) - i then moved from the ground floor of and up to the next floor to get a better look through the larger windows at the top of the stairs - i then captured a 30 second video. my next step was to proceed back to my desk to grab a samsung camera with a lot better zoom capability and go outside into the open - so now with samsung camera and iphone in hand, me and my colleague as headed outside to get a better view, however the objects were now obscured by cloud. we waited around about 5 minutes for the cloud to pass but the objects had gone. i have on my phone the 'flightradar24' app and there were no aircraft in their immediate vicinity - where i work is very close to the take off and approach flight path for manchester airport. the only flight in the area was an air austria embrear which we had to the east on approach to manchester airport which passed right above us whilst we were outside trying to spot the objects. the objects are definitely unidentified to myself and my colleague and if they were man made are not of standard propulsion or shape. the way they were unaffected by their surroundings (weather/clouds) and their ability to move apart and closer to each other suggested they were under intelligent control - however i am still sceptical of what i saw and i'm unconvinced that it is evidence of a space fairing race of aliens.
content.summary: Stationary objects unaffected by weather/atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: Me and two friends we hanging out on our road. i looked up, and at first thought i saw an airliner, but noticed only what appeared to be an orb, and then i noticed several more. they appeared to either blink or pulsate as they flew. they all flew towards the west, just under cloud cover.It was just odd, had never really seen anything like it before. they just continued their flight path, looked away a few times, and the last time i no longer noticed them.
content.summary: Looked up and saw multiple objects.

content.detailedDescription:
Aug 6 2017 

i brought a group to where i caught most of my footage it was my friend and his wife ,15 yr old nephew and 3 kids age 9,7,1 his wife hasn't slept right since that night 
as i captured one that looked like an large orb with wings the others started shouting there another one i didn't get full pic but i got enough and it was all captured on facebook live as i was live because i got a better view saved then if i had of just used camera because i got to record off the bright screen ,so this thing landed about  2 or 3 km to the west of our location in the gravel pits and behind a home then flew over us with no sound , everybody was freaking out .
then the next night i went back and i captured again 2 more just hovering over same location but i only captured a pic w my phone off of my camera monitor but it looks like the same crafts possibly
so many sightings ???????
remember we're in between 2 nuclear plants within 10 km
is there a connection, 
i've become my own investigator because there is really no one who cares 
i went to the local police they laughed me out of the station saying no such thing
i forwarded to local news they emailed me back calling me a jerk off telling me my tinfoil hat is slipping 

mufon#
#84617
#86744
#86747
#86852

content.detailedDescription:
At the time i was taking down a shelter in a drive way, looked up adn saw a shiny object at an extremely high altitude. i am a former pilot/flight instructor and observed a ufo in the past so i know how to scan the sky for anomolies. on this bright clear sunny day, i spotted what at first seemed like a high altitude place but looking closer i can see this was much much higher.As in space higher. i took out my phone and filmed the event. looking back at the video, you clearly see the object and you can see its flight path clearly also in the movie i caught a 2nd orb, and it seems as though one was chasing the other. they eventually caught up to each other and continued going down se direction. at one point, the object hovered and changed direction then changed again to continue its course, at one point it hovered over my area as if it knew i was filming and stayed there for a while. i have several clips and these are good examples of a sighting. with further analysis i am sure one can filter out the image to better see what it is i was seeing. objects disappeared in the horizon. 

having seen and reported a ufo in the past, i knew what i was looking at and this was quite interesting and many people around me also saw it. we were 4 in all who observed this event.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Observone ord direction se, i have it on film and then a second appears as welll--extremely high altitude in space imo - and intelligent in movement

on sept 1 2017 and come almost nightly to date but i can't see them with my eyes only w camera 
so i did a small experment to to see if any would come near me so i set the camera on a timer to give me time to get in middle of the yard so i then pointed blindly to a random spot and when i looked at the pic i seen i was actually pointing directly at one without realizing,what are the odds ? 
imediatly after i discovered them it started to rain but ironically the formed a formation of exactly the same as the orion constellation in which i provided a pic of as well 
just to add to the concerning number of events

content.detailedDescription:
This is just an observation. question?  could yeti and the ancient annonoci civilization be connected?  interbreeding with our past early apemen?  

i have been living with a lot of question most of my life. trying to make sense of all the info out there. i was involved as a child and throughout my life with the belief that i was involved with aliens and was part of what i refer to as a "circle of children". i and my siblings were routinely visited during the night by bright lights, grey monkeys and gathering in the back yard of a neighbors yard with many of the neighborhood children. we were carried through the high windows of our home and across the fence line to be placed in a circle under a bright light. i do not remember any harm at all, actually singing together and curiosity. i also have a vivid memory of a set of ufo's flying over the canyon across the street from our home. throughout my life i felt total fear often during my nights and not being able to move or scream.  i moved homes numerous times throughout my life and eventually this would start to happen again. as i got older and had children my son began to have the same experiences. he was very small and always came running into my bedroom and said the monkeys were coming through his high windows. often, i would take him back to his room and find his windows wide open. again bright lights!  my son now grown remembers all of this. coincidentally, my older sisters do remember the grey monkeys on the fence, but refuse to talk about it. i love to tease them about the high windows in their bedrooms. my older sister has actually put lights in her window so she can't see the bright lights. never admitting why!  i have many more experiences throughout my life too many to mention, but this feels really good to finally get this off my chest. 

thanks for letting an old woman to vent!
pamela storey
content.summary: Disc with bright light emitted from bottom

content.detailedDescription:
I was out for a little walk in the "lüneburger heide" (german national park) with two reletives of mine. we were watching an interesting, but non-relevant cloud formation when one of my reletives noticed a very small sphere right next to it. it was so small, we could barely see it with the naked eye and it appeared to either be reflective or glowing. my relatives thought we were seeing a wheather-balloon while i emediately thought it was an ufo. the object remained sitting static in the air untill a cloud moved between us and the object about 10 minutes after we had noticed it, blocking our view. this was how we lost sight of the object. 
i tried to snap a couple pictures with my smartphone, but the object was so small that it is pretty difficult to make it out in the picture, with enhanced brightness and contrast however you can see a little blurry thing.
content.summary: Stationary, reflective sphere of light, high up in the sky, barely visible

content.detailedDescription: At 11:11 on 9-22-2017 we observed a large white glowing orb circling in a grid pattern continuously moving south just above the clouds.  when it came to a break in the clouds i was able to determine it was a solid object because a star above went out of view while it passed by in it's consistent circular pattern.  5 witnesses observed it for over an hour until we all decided to go inside to bed.  it was still circling as we retreated into the house.  i have have had several ufo observations in this area of the sky over a year now in which one was like a wheel within a wheel than seem to come out of a portal in dive at a ex-stream amount of speed directly into the ground.  i have also seen smaller white orbs do the same thing.  this happened in august of 2016. we are located just east of the blue ridge mountains in the foothills of va.  west of martinsville va.
content.summary: Large white orb circling above the clouds moving south in a circular grid pattern.  when it moved out of cloud cover observed solid object because star above it was obscured.

content.detailedDescription: About 11 p.M. last night (9/22/17) two of us were sitting on the front porch.  my friend noticed what she thought might be mars in the distance, bright red and glowing.  a few minutes later, she noticed mars wasn't there any longer.  quickly we realized a bright red circular object was traveling toward us.  the body of the object was bright red and well-demarcated by the lights.  it eventually passed over our heads and continued on in a straight path.  we noticed there was a single blinking light on either side of the object.  my reaction to it was curiosity.  i watched it for a little bit longer then sat back down on the front porch.
content.summary: Hovering glowing object in distance, then passed directly over us.

content.detailedDescription: There was like 1:30 am someday of 2008 or 2009. i cant remember exactly cause i tried to dont speak about it for a while but then i start talking about that so i can realize that happen arround that time. so i went in front my house to smoke a cigarrete and almost right away i saw a light moving very fast, more than a regular airplane. so i continue looking its path and was a whole crazy thing.. change direction up down left right.. and then divided in four diferents lights, then united again.. turn into a bigger light and then disappear leaving a beam a light
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other

content.detailedDescription: Ive been sitting outside my house in shock as i watch numerous orbe like object fly over the sky at high speeds
content.summary: Many orbe like object flying fast over the sky in the same direction

content.detailedDescription: 5 or 6 boys about 9 years old. selma park b.C. canada. aug 1965 between 2200 hrs and 0200 hrs. unsure exact date or time its been around 52 yrs. we were sleeping out in an open field down near breakwater. we were watching the sky to see if we could see "shooting stars" possible we were looking at perseid showers. we also were looking for satellites, a fairly new phenomenon at that time.   we noticed this bright light that suddenly appeared in nw part of the sky approx. 10 oclock with overhead being 12 oclock. we noticed it because it was much brighter than the surrounding stars/planets. it appeared to be hovering then zipped across the sky towards us then turned at what appeared to be a right angle at a very high rate of speed towards the west. it then stopped and hovered although it appeared to be decending. we were all discussing what this might be, the only thing we agreed on was we had never seen anything move like that. the object then started moving from west to north then seemed to spiral moving quite quickly and seemed like it was moving towards us. i remember being fascinated, then one of my friends said its coming down. i remember it sounded like he was terrified. no one else spoke, then the next thing i know the sun wakes me up around 0900 hrs. we all appeared to wake at the same time. normally we would be awake before first light. i woke up feeling like i had just got over the flu. i was very groggy normally i wake up instantly. i remembered the light and said hey you guys remember that light last night. that was weird, none of them would look at me. no one said anything they stopped and stared at the ground. i said no don't you remember that light we all saw it. they all denied that it happened and they all went home and it was never talked about again. my friends later would deny we ever even slept out that night. its possible ive had other incidences i believe they may be buried deep.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5-6 boys about 9 yrs old. light behaving wildly decending then woke up later.

content.detailedDescription: Gargoil flew under street light 5 feet away
content.summary: Gargoil flying under street light

content.detailedDescription: About 9 object flying fast right under cloud cover. shape of craft is unknown but all craft emmited a yellow-orange glow underneath the crafts. they where in an arrow formation. some craft backed off fast moving in all directions, then quickly got back into formation with the rest of the crafts. flying n-nw. gone in seconds
content.summary: ~9 objects flying fast in an arrow formation

content.detailedDescription:
Aug 14/2017
 why does this keep happening??????
i would love to hear a logical explanation on these encounters?
starting to get a bit unnerving to say the least


i with my buddy riding our motorcycles out to hamilton ontario canada while there we took a couple of pictures which i remembered taking the hamilton steel plant   was the last photos of the night which were fluky weird .
we rode to oshawa together then i proceeded home to blackstock which is an extra 30 min ride n/e into the rural farmland area where i assumed i went straight to bed as it would of been 5 ish in the morning.
because i knew what was on my camera i wasnt in a hurry to look so aug 16 i decided to dump all photos onto computer which was when i found one more video that i had no memory of taking .So i proceeded to watch it and was in shock to see the contents ,then the questions started in my head ,why cant i remember and most pf all why would i stop shooting video at this point? after all the encounters and thousands 0f dollars i spent on camera gear ,why stop shooting there ? .
in the video my take was this craft was as tall as it was long and when it lights up on the bottom they almost look like windows because of the definition of the separate sections ,if they were just lights wouldn't they all blend ?
as crazy as this sounds i have had at least 10 -15 encounters and probably more as im losing count now and all  since june 24 2017 which i will be reporting all as i get through them 
my mufon reports to date 
# 84617
#86747
#86744
and now know of 21 people whom seen ufo's in my area this past summer 
keep in mind we live smack dead center of 2 nuke plants within 10 miles apart
do these plants have anything to do with ? they found decapicated livestock that no one knows how they got there which were   steps away from nuke plant at the same time i captured lots of my footage with crafts over pickering nuke plant which has a no fly zone policy. is it just  a coincidence? 
search url pickering decapitated livestock
content.summary: I have no recolection of shooting this footage and why would i stop it there?
